BigInteger Documentation

v0.0.1

Introduction

It implements the popular 'BigInteger' class in Java. Why I made it? well. I was working on WebPCS project and needed a calculation intensive sample task for testing parallelizibility of my system. so I implemented a 'dot product' sample and needed a JS module can handle huge numbers. The common digit length of calculation was 2000.
Test:
testing constructor & member methods

Diagram

Usage

1. Including

Add following line of code in script block. 
 W.control('BigInteger');

2. Instantiate a control object

In either case, Wednus Platform will loadup the control, and now we can use the control like this: 
 var myTemp = new W.BigInteger();

3. Using object

In either case, Wednus Platform will loadup the control, and now we can use the control like this: 
 alert(myTemp.name);

Code Example

This example will print "246913578246913578246913578246913578", the result of BigInteger addition. 
 <script type='text/javascript'>
 W.control('BigInteger');
 </script>

 <script type='text/javascript'>
 var BIG = '123456789123456789123456789123456790';
 var a = new W.BigInteger(BIG);
 var b = new W.BigInteger(BIG);
 alert(a.add(b));
 </script>

Test:
CodeExample.html
Warning:
Do not merge the two script blocks into one because the control should need to be fully loaded before any use.
